New fiction for September 2019

Written by Brandon King · Published Aug 28, 2019

A bumper fiction crop this month, with new titles from Margaret Atwood, Ann Patchett, Robert Harris, Linwood Barclay, Jessie Burton, Laura Purcell and more.
